title: About Me
description: I'm a software engineer with a passion for creating beautiful and functional web experiences.
tldr: Front-end engineer turned freelance developer. I build performant, accessible web applications and design systems. Currently helping individual clients create high-quality websites with a focus on user experience and measurable results.

content.paragraph: Front-end engineer specializing in building intuitive, performant user interfaces that enable content creation, support business goals, and streamline development workflows. Skilled in scaling design systems and guiding technical design decisions across enterprise-grade applications. Known for working cross-functionally with designers, product managers, and backend engineers to build accessible, reliable, and maintainable UI solutions. Brings a collaborative, flexible mindset and a strong sense of accountability to every project.

Currently, I work as a freelance developer, partnering with individual clients to design and build high-quality websites and web applications. I specialize in delivering tailored solutions that balance performance, usability, and visual polish. Whether it's a marketing site, an interactive product, or a scalable app, I bring a client-focused approach rooted in clear communication, efficient development practices, and a commitment to measurable results.
